scripts.nvm: unset PREFIX && source ~/.nvm/nvm.sh && nvm install && nvm use || echo 'No NVM available'
scripts.shell: npm run nvm && export development=true && export GOOGLE_APPLICATION_CREDENTIALS="$(pwd)/../nutshell-staging.json" && firebase functions:shell
scripts.shell:production: source ~/.nvm/nvm.sh && nvm use && export development=true && export GOOGLE_APPLICATION_CREDENTIALS="$(pwd)/../nutshell-production.json" && firebase functions:shell
scripts.deploy:development: npm run nvm && npm i && firebase use development && firebase deploy --only functions
scripts.deploy:production: npm run nvm && npm i && firebase use production && firebase deploy --only functions
